body: In v1.35 all AI actions took too long,even on low levels - sometimes for 15+ seconds.
author: [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/)
title: AI thinks too long

comments.body:
1.36 will have a hard limit on the thinking time of the minimax AI. You may want to try playing against the monte carlo AI, it always takes "AI level" seconds per decision.

**Status:** Accepted
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

comments.body: Even on Vegas 5 AI thinks longer than 5sec, especially when deciding value of "X" or choosing targets of abilities.
comments.author: [OLEGtheK...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106579007142717194127/)

comments.body: Your right, unlike the monte carlo AI, Vegas may take up to 30 seconds regardless of the AI level. In 1.36, the hard limit of Vegas will be tied to the AI level.
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
